title: (x) Serif type of Underconsideration.com - Georgia {Stephen}
content:
Hello everybody,  
I am new here.  
Somebody could say to me what is the serif font used for body text in the Website: [http://www.underconsideration.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20080207073447/http:/www.underconsideration.com/ "http://www.underconsideration.com/") ?  
thanks!  
Tobias

 [‹ Ibanez Guitars logo](http://web.archive.org/web/20080207073447/http:/www.typophile.com/node/41641 "Go to previous forum topic") [Iceberg logo semi-slabserif ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080207073447/http:/www.typophile.com/node/41646 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Tobias75

comments.content:
As its HTML/CSS defined ’body text’, this should be ’Georgia’.  
_(Edit/Addendum: Me. Tooooo slow. Seconds. Again. But, as Stephen ’said’, Georgia. ;)_

Dav(id)
